resources.string: This app may fail to run in the background or with the screen off on some devices. Please visit https://dontkillmyapp.com/ to see solutions for your device.
Your device lacks a rotation vector sensor. Fallback to game rotation vector will be used, but you will experience yaw drift.
ALL REQUIRED SENSORS ARE UNAVAILABLE! Sorry, but this app will not work on your device, as you must at least have a game rotation vector.
